description:
Summer! Swimsuits! The beach! Illya and the others enjoy the beach to fullest, playing along the shore and celebrating their birthday in a beach hut♪ But the popsicle seller they encounter there turns out to be the fierce foe they fought a hard pressed battle against... And to make matters worse, Ruby adds a Love Potion that makes Shirou go crazy! Will Illya`s desires come to fruition in an unexpected way?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: トリコロール・バースデー
